[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@tridion-sites/extensions](./extensions.md) &gt; [TableColumnHookResult](./extensions.tablecolumnhookresult.md) &gt; [initialWidth](./extensions.tablecolumnhookresult.initialwidth.md)

## TableColumnHookResult.initialWidth property

The initial width of the column.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly initialWidth?: number;
```

## Remarks

If the [TableColumnHookResult.isResizable](./extensions.tablecolumnhookresult.isresizable.md) is set to `true`<!-- -->, this value is utilized for initial width calculations of each column. Otherwise, the column will have a fixed width based on this value.
